content:
"""Divide a by b. Raises ZeroDivisionError if b is zero."""
    if b == 0:
        raise ZeroDivisionError("Cannot divide by zero")
    return a / b
description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. - Fix the divide function to use parameter b instead of hardcoded 0, add zero-division check with proper error handling, and improve the docstring

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding.
